CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT asks INV where she should sit in the room then closes the door
<bef> CHI walks into the center of the room and looks around . CHI walks out of camera range over to the table on the corner
MOT and CHI are out of camera range
CHI turns and walks across the room while looking down
<aft> CHI sits down in the middle of the room then turns and looks up in the direction of MOT
CHI looks up at MOT briefly then looks down at his legs
MOT is still out of camera range
MOT walks over and sits on the floor next to CHI
MOT looks at CHI while holding a box in the air
<aft> MOT places the box on the floor
CHI looks down at the box on the floor
CHI hovers over the box looking down
CHI reaches into the box and removes the book
CHI places the book on the floor by MOT's feet
CHI looks down as he nods his head yes
CHI looks on as MOT reads
CHI looks up at MOT then down at the book
CHI looks on as MOT reads
CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book
CHI leans forward a bit as he looks down at the book
CHI nods his head yes as he looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book

CHI leans forward on one elbow while looking down at the book . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT

CHI looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book

CHI turns and looks down toward MOT's drawing
